title: Chasing My Mate
description: Fallon Wright has been in love with her brother’s best friend since she was a kid. Days away from her eighteenth birthday, all she can wonder is if her wish will come true. Will Krew be her fated mate?  Krew Dawson has wanted Fallon Wright since the moment he laid eyes on her. Puppy love, most people called it but him and his wolf have always known that it was more than that. She’s the only one who has been able to claim his heart.  Krew has spent the last few years chasing off any guy who showed an interest in his girl but he’s tired of chasing off guys. Now he’s going to start chasing his mate.  *Warning: This instalove shifter story is quick and dirty with plenty of heat! Looking for a hero who is obsessed with his mate? Then this is the book for you!
author: Skye Alder
